trans-unit.source: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).
trans-unit.target: Proporciona la funcionalidad del sistema de escritura de texto para los dispositivos de destino del conjunto de adaptadores de XHTML, que incluye XHTML (Extensible Hypertext Markup Language), XHTML Mobile y WML (Wireless Markup Language).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types.
trans-unit.target: XHTML es un marcado compatible con XML que se basa en HTML 4.1 y permite crear sitios Web convenientes para varios tipos de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: Combina facilidad de HTML de uso con instrucciones de elemento estrictas de XML para generar un lenguaje de marcado con una amplia gama de opciones de formato y estilo y reduce la ambigüedad de la etiqueta de marcado.

trans-unit.source: This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase proporciona funciones de formato que los controles de servidor ASP.NET utilizan al representar el contenido XHTML a los clientes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> representa el marcado que cumple los estándares de tres tipos de documentos XHTML: XHTML Basic, que admite los elementos de estilo y formato limitados; XHTML Mobile Profile, que es compatible con las hojas de estilos en línea; y WML 2.0, que se basa en XHTML 1.1 y admite hojas de estilos en cascada.

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase la usan principalmente los programadores de adaptadores de control y página móvil personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> clase puede representar todos los elementos HTML, los atributos y atributos, pero, a diferencia de estilo el <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> de clases, no permite el uso de mayúsculas de título de estos elementos de marcado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> instantiates an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>, that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> crea una instancia de un <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> y según las capacidades del dispositivo de destino, inicializa un número de propiedades, como <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>, que ayudan al escritor de texto en la página y sus controles de representación.

trans-unit.source: Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting:
trans-unit.target: El adaptador puede usar diversos métodos para aplicar estilos y formato de control:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A>,
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A>,

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>, and
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>, y

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterFormat%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitFormat%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> class, which in turn derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MultiPartWriter> class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> (clase), que a su vez se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MultiPartWriter> (clase), gran parte de su funcionalidad se proporciona y estas clases base.

trans-unit.source: You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar los miembros de esta clase y ningún miembro hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> (clase), para crear escritores de texto personalizado para usar en una página XHTML personalizada o en adaptadores de clase.

trans-unit.source: You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: También puede crear nuevas clases derivadas que invalidan el comportamiento estándar de la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control.
trans-unit.target: Filtrado de dispositivos es necesario para poder usar un adaptador específico o un escritor de texto para un control de servidor.

trans-unit.source: For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca del filtrado de dispositivos, consulte [arquitectura Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) y [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: para trabajar en un entorno hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; valor de permiso: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: The base writer object, usually an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: El objeto de escritor base, normalmente un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: An object of <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> class that provides the capability information for the target device.
trans-unit.target: Objeto de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> que proporciona la información de funcionalidad para el dispositivo de destino.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlMobileTextWriter" /> class for the provided device, using the <paramref name="writer" /> parameter as the base writer object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlMobileTextWriter" /> para el dispositivo proporcionado utilizando el parámetro <paramref name="writer" /> como objeto de sistema de escritura base.

trans-unit.target: Ciertos dispositivos WML exigen un `<wml:onevent>` elemento para proporcionar información de devolución de datos.

trans-unit.source: WML devices provide limited functionality for navigation and postback, and require WML commands and variables to be written to the page.
trans-unit.target: Los dispositivos WML proporcionan una funcionalidad limitada para navegación y la devolución de datos y requieran comandos WML y variables se escriban en la página.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object to save all rendered markup until written out in its entirety by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EndCachedRendering" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Indica al objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> que guarde el marcado representado hasta que el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EndCachedRendering" /> lo escriba completamente.

trans-unit.target: Obtiene la clave única utilizada para recuperar los elementos de <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Cache" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> containing a unique key.
trans-unit.target: Valor de tipo <see langword="string" /> que contiene una clave única.

trans-unit.source: Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Algunos dispositivos no permiten los estilos en línea en elementos, pero requieren información de estilo proporcionarse desde una hoja de estilos vinculada.

trans-unit.source: If the linked style sheet is stored in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>, the URL contains a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey%2A> that identifies the style sheet to return.
trans-unit.target: Si la hoja de estilos vinculada se almacena en la <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>, la dirección URL contiene un único <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey%2A> que identifica la hoja de estilos para devolver.

trans-unit.source: For these target devices, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching.
trans-unit.target: Para estos dispositivos, como destino el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> se mueve la información de controles representados a una hoja de estilos para el almacenamiento en caché de estilo.

trans-unit.source: A page adapter can instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> to save the style sheet in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A>, or in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A> before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: Un adaptador de página puede indicar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> para guardar la hoja de estilos en el <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> con <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A>, o en la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> con <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A> antes de procesar la página.

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad la usan principalmente los programadores de adaptadores de control y página móvil personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey(System.Web.Caching.Cache)" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: No se ha llamado al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey(System.Web.Caching.Cache)" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCachedRendering%2A> has been called, the `style` is set as the current style, and a beginning `<span>` element that implements the style is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCachedRendering%2A> se ha llamado, el `style` se establece como el estilo actual y un principio `<span>` elemento que implemente el estilo se escribe en el flujo de salida.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCachedRendering%2A> has been called, the `style` is set as the current style, and a beginning `<span>` element that implements the style is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginCachedRendering%2A> se ha llamado, el `style` se establece como el estilo actual y un principio `<span>` elemento que implemente el estilo se escribe en el flujo de salida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key used to retrieve items from the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Session" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la clave única utilizada para recuperar los elementos de <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Session" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> containing the key.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see langword="string" /> que contiene la clave.

trans-unit.source: Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Algunos dispositivos no permiten los estilos en línea en elementos, pero requieren información de estilo proporcionarse desde una hoja de estilos vinculada.

trans-unit.source: If the linked style sheet is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>, the URL contains a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SessionKey%2A> that identifies the style sheet to return.
trans-unit.target: Si la hoja de estilos vinculada se almacena en la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>, la dirección URL contiene un único <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SessionKey%2A> que identifica la hoja de estilos para devolver.

trans-unit.source: For these target devices, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para estos dispositivos, como destino el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> mueve estilo información de los controles representados a una hoja de estilos para almacenar en caché en el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A page adapter can instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> to save the style sheet in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A>, or in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A> before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: Un adaptador de página puede indicar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> para guardar la hoja de estilos en el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> con <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A>, o en la <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> con <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A> antes de procesar la página.

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad la usan principalmente los programadores de adaptadores de control y página móvil personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey(System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState)" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: No se ha llamado al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey(System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the provided style as the style for the <see langword="<body>" /> element of the page and as the default style for its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Establece el estilo proporcionado como estilo para el elemento <see langword="<body>" /> de la página y como estilo predeterminado para sus controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Writes an attribute and its value to the current element using the provided attribute and value, and encodes the value if specified.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null` or an empty string, no attribute is written because XHTML requires that all attributes have values.

trans-unit.source: \<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD XHTML Mobile 1.0//EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/DTD/xhtml-mobile10.dtd">
trans-unit.target: \<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD XHTML Mobile 1.0 / / EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/DTD/xhtml-mobile10.dtd" >

trans-unit.source: \<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD WML 2.0//EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/dtd/wml20.dtd">
trans-unit.target: \<\!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD WML 2.0 / / EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/dtd/wml20.dtd" >

trans-unit.source: Writes a line terminator string to the output stream if the current element is not a block element such as <see langword="<p>" />, <see langword="<div>" />, <see langword="<ul>" />, <see langword="<table>" />, and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine" /> is <see langword="false" />, and there is a pending break.
trans-unit.target: Escribe una cadena de terminador de línea en el flujo de salida si el elemento actual no es un elemento de bloque como <see langword="<p>" />, <see langword="<div>" />, <see langword="<ul>" />, <see langword="<table>" /> y <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine" /> es <see langword="false" /> y existe un punto de interrupción pendiente.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el nombre del parámetro de dirección URL.

trans-unit.source: Writes an encoded URL, which includes a query-string parameter, to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Escribe una dirección URL codificada, que incluye un parámetro de cadena de consulta, en el flujo de salida.

trans-unit.source: Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them.
trans-unit.target: Tanto el nombre del parámetro y el valor de dirección URL están codificados y se inserta un signo igual (=) entre ellos.

trans-unit.source: Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.
trans-unit.target: Los espacios en el `name` o `value` cadenas se codifican como signos más (+) y signos igual (=) se codifican como % 3d.

trans-unit.source: Writes an XML declaration along with the current document encoding value.
trans-unit.target: Escribe una declaración XML junto con el valor de codificación del documento actual.
